title: Episode 219 w/ DJ Khaled
itunes:title: Episode 219 w/ DJ Khaled
description:
N.O.R.E. & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. CLOTH TALK alert! In this episode we chop it up with the one and only DJ Khaled.

Khaled blesses the DC table as he shares his musical journey. Khaled shares stories from his underground radio days to co-hosting a radio show with Uncle Luke. He talks about his love for reggae and dance hall and how grateful he is to Beyoncé & JAY Z.

Khaled shares great stories about his friendship with Drake, and his evolution as a producer to a hit-maker! DJ EFN & DJ Khaled reminisce about the early days, coming up in Miami, recording freestyles for mixtapes and DJing clubs.

This episode is filled with lots of keys… major keys! Don’t miss out!

Listen and subscribe at http://www.drinkchamps.com

Follow:

N.O.R.E.

http://www.instagram.com/therealnoreaga

http://www.twitter.com/noreaga
